a.title: To be conformant, the concept in this element SHALL be from the specified value set.

description.value: This profile records the pharmacists observation of new information about the patient obtained from monitoring devices such as blood glucose, blood pressure monitors, weight,scales, and movement trackers. This profile constrains the US Core Procedure profile. It includes value sets intended for use by pharmacy systems. Everywhere it is referenced, an unconstrained US Core Procedure reference is also allowed.
